title: Happy Halloween!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Hanayo-chan, look at me~! I’m a witch!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Waaah, it’s so cute! You look great, Honoka-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe~. Your black cat costume also looks good on you, Hanayo-chan. You’re matching with Rin-chan and Maki-chan, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! The three of us made them together. I wonder when everyone else will come.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s right, hey, are you prepared for the prank?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? Y-, yeah, more or less.... But I’m sure Nozomi-chan and the others have already prepared sweets, so we probably won’t be able to do it, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm.... Since it’s Halloween, I want to have fun doing some pranks too! Dressing up, getting sweets, then playing pranks.... isn’t that just the best!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh!? W-, well, I don’t know about that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>But, I guess if the sweets are suuuuuuuuper tasty, we might just forget about the pranks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Honoka-chan.... You’re going to jinx it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
